title: 你们白嫖到GTAV没
author: FireworkPolymer
txt_content:
可能有人说过这件事了，但是我还是想说一下，豪华版一分钱不花真的香

（虽然我带不起，但是我至少得要有啊）

replies.author: 风灬晴
replies.txt_content: 没有漂到（哭）233

replies.author: Mr.时间之瓶
replies.txt_content: 没有

replies.author: 这名都敏感
replies.txt_content: 还能嫖吗

replies.author: 零素
replies.txt_content: 去年已经买了

replies.author: nn虾米nn
replies.txt_content: GTA送之前难道不应该是人手一个的吗

replies.author: ChallengerX
replies.txt_content: 表示之前在steam上就买了……

replies.author: FaceTime
replies.txt_content: 15年就买了/

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: 你去试试啊，比mc流畅

replies.author: 缘若轻殇
replies.txt_content: 我差点完了，去嫖一下
早就买了 早就通了

replies.author: 这名都敏感
replies.txt_content: 刚嫖到了，真香，Epic嫖了3款游戏了

replies.author: 小孩孩
replies.txt_content:
这。。。
硬盘塞不下了
白嫖也玩不动了

replies.author: Chocolate_ing
replies.txt_content: 妈妈说好孩子不白嫖

replies.author: A186_74C
replies.txt_content:
废话，嫖到了
（EPIC YES)
虽然带不起来

replies.author: Blumekranz
replies.txt_content: 我之前花钱买的，我还没怎么玩，现在感觉血亏

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content: 大概是人满了吧 上不去了

replies.author: 兔子BUG
replies.txt_content: 听说过，不过没弄

replies.author: a229596451
replies.txt_content:
不会还有人没有GTAV吧？
不会吧不会吧不会吧

replies.author: dsjjyfsj123
replies.txt_content:
嫖到了，0基础的我一进游戏上来二话不说直接击杀人质
